thread.section_title: Latest in Anime News by Crunchyroll!
thread.title: "Berserk" Manga Return Scheduled

author: news+feed@crunchyroll.com
title: "Berserk" Manga Return Scheduled
text:
As promised, both the  Berserk   anime and Kentaro Miura manga are returning this spring. While the anime had been scheduled for April 7th, an early look at the March 24th issue of home, twice-monthly magaine magazine Young Animal, in shops on March 10th, shows that the series returns in the next issue. 
 
次号からベルセルク連載再開か！月イチだけど！ pic.twitter.com/FxtFm3RHnU 
— 六甲 (@earlbox) March 7, 2017  
 
 
Earlier preview of what's to come from chapter 348


 

Scott Green is editor and reporter for anime and manga at geek entertainment site  Ain't It Cool News . Follow him on Twitter at  @aicnanime .
